title: LiveBomber - MSN Flooder/Spam Bot - VaUgHaNdS
description:
This is a fun little application I&#039;ve had for a while; 100% freeware can&#039;t rememeber where I got it from though, I&#039;m still working on an NFO or something for the stuff I upload even though most of it IS hidden gems of things that you don&#039;t find anywhere else. I couldn&#039;t find this on any other torrent track so here it is.

It is NOT English so here are some instructions:

1. Load Live Bomber up

Tipo de envio:
Select: Floodeo

The textbox to the right? Type the message you want to spam there.
I&#039;m yet to find out what the drop down box does so leave it alone.


The second set of options is the amount of times to repeat it; or something to that effect. Offical translations are welcome =).


EDIT: Forgot, select the textbox entry of the person you want to flood as you were going to type something to them, then switch to LiveBomber and hit Enviar, let the floods begin!


ALSO:
